item.title: About
item.description: Hi, My name is Rohit Kumar Jha. I work as an application engineer at Media.net. My areas of interest include Competitive Programming, Big Data, Machine Learning and writing scalable code. Besides, I also love to play first person shooter games and am a gym freak :) I look forward to writing stuff and expressing my views through the medium of this site.
